meanings.sent1: She preallotted the tasks to each team member before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The teacher preallotted the seats for the students on the bus.
meanings.sent3: The party planner preallotted the balloons to the wrong room by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The captain preallotted the roles to the crew members like a skilled strategist.
meanings.sent5: The chef preallotted the ingredients for the recipe to ensure a smooth cooking process.

meanings.sent1: The preallotted seats were marked with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The preallotted time for the presentation was too short.
meanings.sent3: The preallotted snacks were gone before the movie even started.
meanings.sent4: The preallotted budget for the project was exceeded due to unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent5: The preallotted rooms in the hotel had beautiful views of the city skyline.
